I would like to invite you to dinner

SI: Mi lahko zaupate svojo telefonsko številko?
MI lahko zaupate vaš elektronski poštni naslov?

EN: Do you have any pictures of you?
Would you like to go for a walk?

Did you understand what I said?

SI: Kaj ta beseda pomeni v angleščini?

EN: How do you say "thanks" in Slovene?
How can I get to (this place, this city)?
SI: Kako lahko pridem do tega (kraja, mesta)

EN: How long does it take to get there?
Hold on please! (when on the phone)

SI: Fraze, ki se uporabljajo v nujnih primerih in za preživetje

EN: I have a reservation (for a room)
I would like a non-smoking room

SI: Želel bi najeti rent a car

EN: What's the name of this dish?
Can we have the check please?
This is nonsense! (or: this is craziness)

SI: Moje potovanje je bilo zelo prijetno

SI: Kultura in ljudje so zelo zanimivi

EN: I had a good time with you
SI: z vami sem se imel zelo lepo

EN: Don't forget to write me back from time to time

SI: Povprečno _ which menas literary average, there is no equvalent expression for so-so in slov. lang.
